LQR¶

lqr controller¶

class scripts.controllers.lqr.controller.Controller(ref_traj, robot, plotting, dt=0.2)[source]¶
control()[source]¶
DLQR(A, B)[source]¶

Solve the discrete time lqr controller. x[k+1] = A x[k] + B u[k] cost = sum x[k].T*Q*x[k] + u[k].T*R*u[k]

update()[source]¶
find_nearest_ind(pose)[source]¶

lqr controller_r module¶

control()[source]¶
DLQR(A, B)[source]¶

Solve the discrete time lqr controller. x[k+1] = A x[k] + B u[k] cost = sum x[k].T*Q*x[k] + u[k].T*R*u[k] # ref Bertsekas, p.151
